ISSUE.TITLE: Swager API doc shows endpoints from all projects
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: XC Swigger UI shows endpoints to all projects on NocoDB instance. All endpoints have 'project_name' in URL as in project from which user came. Unauthorized users won't get access, but can see data structure. Confusing, but not critical. Node: **v12.22.12** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.90.7**

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #1893 from nocodb/fix/s3 fix: storage adapter issue

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: pass correct project id to get model list get models from current project to populate swagger json for current project re #1899 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
